modShortDescription: Adds more trap types to the game. Some really funny ones to lol. Damn those drunk zombies.
modDescription:
Adds more [trap](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-traps/) types to the game. Some really funny ones to lol. Damn those drunk zombies.

## Changelog

**Fixed:** Gave damage to the traps so they do break.

You can adjust them in the blocks.xml in the config file.

```
<property name="Damage" value="1" /> ( how much the trap damages the entity)
        <property name="Damage_received" value="1" />(how much the entity damages the trap)


       <property name="MaxDamage" value="168"/>(total amount of damage of trap before trap breaks)
```

**Please note:** The Damage and the Damage received should be the same value.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/stallionsden/Valmar-Modlets/tree/master/Valmars%20Expanded%20Traps)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/20079-valmars-a19-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Valmar](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/valmar/), [Stallionsden](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/stallionsden/)
